channel.title: Help pl0x? Only a skiller coder I think
channel.description: Hey guys! I just wanted to know, Is there a way I can add something that bans any person with the name 'tony' in it besides me?

item.title: Help pl0x? Only a skiller coder I think
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

[quote=“Hidendra, post:11, topic:231852”][quote author=Project Evolution link=topic=305392.msg2447439#msg2447439 date=1221794680]
You mean Literating?
[/quote]
No, iterating. Another word for looping.[/quote]
Thank you I did’nt know what you meant, I dont know alot about Looping even though its very important.

Ok I think im getting it, would you add,

for (int i : invalidnames) {

Under,
public String invalidnames[] = {“name”,“name”,“name”,“name”};
Please give me some information?

Read full topic
item.source: Help pl0x? Only a skiller coder I think

item.title: Help pl0x? Only a skiller coder I think
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

In client.java declare,

public String invalidnames[] = {"name","name","name","name"};

You will change the “name” to what ever you want to be blocked. Feel free to add more aswell.
Then, still in Client.java add this:

if(playerName.contains(invalidnames[i])) { } else { savefile = false; disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName); returnCode = 4; } else if { if(playerRights >= 1) { disconnected = false; } }
Which you can put under,

public void run();

Read full topic
item.source: Help pl0x? Only a skiller coder I think

item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:5, topic:231852”][quote author=Project Evolution link=topic=305392.msg2447377#msg2447377 date=1221792801]

public void badNames() { if(playerName.contains("Tony") || playerName.contains("tony")) { if(kickTimer == 0) { sendMessage("[ERROR]: Use a name without a symbol, and come back."); if(checkbannedusers() != 5) { disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName); checkbannedusers(); } kickTimer = 20; } } }
Try that.
Declare it.
[/quote]
Will this ban My account?
It looks like it will…[/quote]
Oops looks like it will. Let me fix it.

Read full topic
